commit.message:
feat: Major portfolio enhancements and UX improvements

- Enhanced About Me section with MagicUI Highlighter and improved typography
- Replaced custom IconCloud with professional 21st.dev Interactive Icon Cloud
- Updated tab switcher icons (PocketKnife, Brain) and refreshed tools list
- Cleaned up section headers (removed icons/subheaders, consistent styling)
- Added balanced 'Currently Exploring' badge to Education section
- Fixed mobile section ordering (Education first on mobile)
- Improved ExpandableTabs component with smooth transitions
- Updated toolSlugs array with current tools (added claude, spotify, apple, removed sketch, adobexd)
- Enhanced overall visual consistency and professional appearance
commit.author: Josh Vilensky

notes.summary: feat: Major portfolio enhancements and UX improvements
notes.fullMessage:
feat: Major portfolio enhancements and UX improvements

- Enhanced About Me section with MagicUI Highlighter and improved typography
- Replaced custom IconCloud with professional 21st.dev Interactive Icon Cloud
- Updated tab switcher icons (PocketKnife, Brain) and refreshed tools list
- Cleaned up section headers (removed icons/subheaders, consistent styling)
- Added balanced 'Currently Exploring' badge to Education section
- Fixed mobile section ordering (Education first on mobile)
- Improved ExpandableTabs component with smooth transitions
- Updated toolSlugs array with current tools (added claude, spotify, apple, removed sketch, adobexd)
- Enhanced overall visual consistency and professional appearance
